1.long: I come into being, am born, become, come about, happen.

gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.
Caesar, a surname of the gens Iulia, which became practically synonymous with the Emperor for the time being; in the Gospels it always refers to Tiberias.
Augustus, a title conferred on the first Roman Emperor, C. Iulius Octauianus, denoting sanctity (almost divinity).
